application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 11 (Landscaping and Landscape Maintenance) of planning permission reference 49467/APP/2022/2801, dated 18-05-2023, for the 'Partial demolition and extension to existing building to provide additional self-storage floorspace (Use Class B8) with associated new car and cycle parking, refuse storage, landscaping and other associated works ancillary to the development.'
decision_conditions: Works need to comply with the Canal & River Trust's 'Code of Practice for Works affecting the Canal & River Trust'. The applicant/developer is advised to contact Will Harding, Trust Works Engineer to discuss these matters further to ensure that any works comply with the Code and that the necessary licences or agreements are obtained before any works are carried out on or over Trust-owned land or waterspace. (enquiries.tpwsouth@canalrivertrust.org.uk).
